content:
My life is currently under construction (isn’t it always though?). I am a Civil Engineering undergraduate student at NIT Silchar 🎓. I am fascinated by the amazing new advancements taking place in the various fields of Civil Engineering spanning from transport & network systems, hydrological sciences, geosciences to geotechnical engineering, uses of efficient tools for understanding problems better and solving them.
Currently, I am working with Dr. Suprava Jena and with Dr. Amit Kumar Das. In the past, I’ve worked closely with Prof. Ashim Kanti Dey.
Apart from academics, I dabble often in pretty much everything but human psychology (behavioural!) and science & tech happen to have the largest shares. These days I am exploring ICT effects on Transportation Systems and also teaching myself to code.
Will be more than happy to connect! Follow @rawslayn
💕 ➜ 🌇 🏃‍♀️ 🏊‍♀️ 👩‍🎓 📚 👩‍💻 🎶 🎧 👩‍🍳 🌱 💃 ⛰️ 🗺️ 🌆 (not always in that order)
Currently reading 📖 Atomic Habits by James Clear.
 Download my résumé.

I am fascinated by the amazing new advancements taking place in the various fields of Civil Engineering spanning from transport & network systems, hydrological sciences, geosciences to geotechnical engineering, uses of efficient tools for understanding problems better and solving them.

content:
Things I want to do before I die. Please let me know if you have any recommendation. Inspired by the amazing List 100 by Chip Huyen
 Be awesome Be kind Adopt a pet from a shelter Help build resilient communities Start a non profit organization Start an art and crafts website Run a marathon Go hiking Learn Japanese Start a company Get published Build my own home Visit Studio Ghibli Park, Japan Sponsor Europe trip to parents Learn to play guitar Start a fun and in ways helpful blog Start a YouTube travel channel See auroras Be in Paris! Read 1000 books Travel to 100 (or more) countries Build my own sustainable garden Live in another country Publish a paper  (this is a running list will keep on updating!)
